mapper.insert: insert into sp_semic_child_dictionary (id, semic_dictionary_id, abbreviation, description, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, full_name) values (#{id}, #{semicDictionaryId}, #{abbreviation}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy}, #{fullName})
